entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
